training_qas.question: Can you build a settlement on the first turn?
relevant_chunks: The first player places 1 settlement on an empty intersection of their choice.
training_qas.answer: Yes, each player may place one settlement at the start of the game.

training_qas.question: Can you use Year of Plenty to take two of the same resource?
relevant_chunks: When you play this card, take any 2 resource cards from the supply. Add them to your hand. They may be 2 of the same resource or 2 different resources.
training_qas.answer: Yes, you may choose any two, even duplicates.

training_qas.question: What does the Monopoly card do?
relevant_chunks: When you play this card, announce one type of resource. Each player must give you all their resource cards of that type.
training_qas.answer: It lets you take all cards of one resource type from every player.

training_qas.question: Can you build a city without a settlement?
training_qas.answer: Yes, as long as you have enough resources.

training_qas.question: Can you steal from a player with no resource cards?
relevant_chunks: Steal 1 random resource card from a player who has a building on that hex.

training_qas.question: Can you win by revealing multiple Victory Point cards mid-turn?
relevant_chunks: Reveal all your Victory Point cards, including any built this turn, if you can reach the number of VPs needed to win.
Turn over any number of Victory Point cards, including ones built this turn, to show that you have reached 10 VPs.
training_qas.answer: Yes, you can reveal them anytime to reach 10 points and win.

training_qas.question: Can you trade after building?
relevant_chunks: You may take actions in this phase as often as you like and in any order, as long as you have the resources to do so.
training_qas.answer: Yes, you can trade and build in any order.

training_qas.question: Can you downgrade a city back to a settlement?
relevant_chunks: Cities always replace settlements. To build a city, remove one of your settlements from the board, return it to your player area, and place your city where the settlement was located.

training_qas.question: Can you use a harbor without building a settlement there?
relevant_chunks: If you have a building on a 3:1 port, you may put 3 of the same resource cards into the supply and take 1 card of a different resource from the supply.
training_qas.answer: No, you must control the harbor with a settlement or city.

training_qas.question: Can you build a road through another player's settlement?
relevant_chunks: You may not build a road starting on the other side of an opponent's building.
training_qas.answer: No, you cannot pass through another player's settlement or city.
